SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwHTAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Hireling			    0 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30
; 1 = Retainer			    5 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Oathman			  10 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Lawman			  20 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Mouth				  30 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 30, Willpower 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = Spellwright		  45 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 31, Willpower 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = Wizard				  60 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 32, Willpower 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = Master				  80 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 33, Willpower 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Magister			100 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 34, Willpower 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Archmagister		125 TelvanniReputation,	Intelligence 35, Willpower 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Telvanni = Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Restoration, Illusion, Mysticism.


SHORT TelvanniAdvancement
	; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
	; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
	; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
	; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
	; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
	; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT TelvanniReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

float fQuestDelayTime

BEGIN GameMode

	if (fQuestDelayTime != 0.5)
		set fQuestDelayTime to 0.5
	endif
	
	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction 0Telvanni == 0
		return
	endif
	
	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF TelvanniAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement == 40	; Qualified to start building Stronghold
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 41 ; this is moot because House Telvanni handlse this particular advancement differently
			SetStage fbmwHTStronghold 5
			AddTopic 1Stronghold
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 91
			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 0
; Continue processing to see if player can advance multiple ranks
;		RETURN
	ENDIF ; TelvanniAdvancement == 4

	IF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement >= 41 && GetStage fbmwHTStronghold < 1
		SetStage fbmwHTStronghold 1
		AddTopic 1Stronghold
	ENDIF

	IF TelvanniAdvancement == 3 || TelvanniAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF


	IF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Telvanni == 0
		IF TelvanniReputation >= 5
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Alteration >= 10 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 10 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 10 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 10 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 10 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 10
			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Telvanni == 1
		IF TelvanniReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Alteration >= 20 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 20 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 20 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 20 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 20 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 20
			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Telvanni == 2
		IF TelvanniReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Alteration >= 30 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 30 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 30 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 30 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 30 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 30
			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Telvanni == 3
		IF TelvanniReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 30 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Alteration >= 40 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 40 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 40 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 40 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 40 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 40
			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Telvanni == 4
		IF TelvanniReputation >= 45
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 31 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Alteration >= 50 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 50 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 50 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 50 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 50 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 50
			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Telvanni == 5
		IF TelvanniReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 32 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Alteration >= 60 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 60 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 60 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 60 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 60 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			IF GetStage fbmwHTStronghold < 100 || GetStage fbmwHTRecruitEddie < 100
				IF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement != 59 ; Don't do this more than Once!
					SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 59
				ENDIF
			ELSE
				SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 60
			ENDIF

			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Telvanni == 6
		IF TelvanniReputation >= 80
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 33 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Alteration >= 70 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 70 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 70 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 70 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 70 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			IF GetStage fbmwHTStronghold < 255
				IF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement != 69 ; Don't do this more than Once!
					SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 69
					SetStage fbmwHTStronghold 105
				ENDIF
			ELSE
				SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 70
			ENDIF

			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

; --------------- Advancement past this point is handled completely different for House Telvanni
;
;	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Telvanni == 7
;		IF TelvanniReputation >= 100
;			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
;		ENDIF
;
;		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 34 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 34
;			IF Player.GetAV Alteration >= 80 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 80 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 80 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 80 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 80 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 80
;				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
;			ENDIF
;		ENDIF
;
;		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
;			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 80
;			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 3
;			AddTopic 1Advancement
;		ENDIF
;
;	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwHTAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank 0Telvanni == 8
;		IF TelvanniReputation >= 125
;			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
;		ENDIF
;
;		IF Player.GetAV Intelligence >= 35 && Player.GetAV Willpower >= 35
;			IF Player.GetAV Alteration >= 90 || Player.GetAV Conjuration >= 90 || Player.GetAV Illusion >= 90 || Player.GetAV Destruction >= 90 || Player.GetAV Restoration >= 90 || Player.GetAV Mysticism >= 90
;				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
;			ENDIF
;		ENDIF
;
;		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
;			SetStage fbmwHTAdvancement 90
;			SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 3
;			AddTopic 1Advancement
;		ENDIF

	ENDIF


	; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
	; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET TelvanniAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 2951 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>

CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
